title: 01 = Zero one. [Ep. 73/10]
brief_description: Cinemagazine items including: 1. Arlesondt, situated on one of Norway’s countless fjiords - fishing agriculture and factory work. 2. First ever World Helicopter Championships (12 nations) take place on an airfield near Hanover in the north of Germany. 3. New field of application for plastic polypropylene in the manufacture of car batteries. 4. Blood banks can save many people’s lives. 5. Water from a river on the Franco-German border considered as the dirtiest river in Europe is to test a new purifying agent.
